nodes.text: The Horror by Night is a short story that was published in Galaxy Guide 3: The Empire Strikes Back. It was also included in The Movie Trilogy Sourcebook.
Voren Na'al reported on the efforts by the wampa to harass Echo Base, and the heroic efforts by the Rebel troopers to beat them back.
It is based on a deleted scene from Star Wars: Episode V The Empire Strikes Back.
